1360950.name: Fantasy Grounds - Fae Land JumpStart
1360950.description:
This module is free with the purchase of another paid item in our store. In order to check out and have the item added to your account, you must have a final cart amount greater than $0. You can add other items to your cart and check out with any number of free items as long as you have one or more non-free items. Alternately, you can manually install this module by downloading the file and placing it in your modules folder.

Manual Download Link
Fae Land JumpStart
The Dawndusk Revel is a special moment in the fae calendar, where seelie and unseelie alike travel The Staircases in great numbers, meet up, and forget their differences.
This revel will be different, though. Someone plans to crash the party.
Can your fae heroes work together to stop the revel-poopers from spoiling the fun?
It's time for true heroes to awaken.
Product contains:
  • A full adventure.
  • Setting background information
  • New character options available to any fae hero
  • Six pre-gen heroes to get you playing fast!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jeannette Jarrar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
